title: Verify: Implement CI/CD Pipeline with Coverage Reporting
description:
Run automated tests for task T-074.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Set up GitHub Actions for lint, type-check, test, and build on every PR. Add coverage reporting and separate deploy pipelines for staging and production.
Criteria:
- CI runs lint, type-check, test, build on PRs
- Coverage reports uploaded
- Separate deploy pipelines for staging/prod
acceptance_criteria: CI runs lint, type-check, test, build on PRs
